name: Roll Over (HackTrout)
description:
You work in a casino where giants' come to gamble their hard earned boulders of gold. As a diceling, you're the perfect size to fit in their massive dice and you can shift the weight of the dice as you make move around inside. Your the perfect fit for ensuring that any patrons aren't too lucky. Controls
  • Movement: "A" and "D" to go left and right
  • Jumping: Space bar
  • Interacting: "W"
Background

Submitted to the GMTK game jam in summer of 2022. The theme was Roll of the Dice.

Credits

Made using Godot. Sprites were made with GraphicsGale. Sound FX made with sfxr. Check out my twitter too!

Credit to flowehead for the music track "Chops". Check out their soundcloud and youtube channel!
